content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6505,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a51a14ab-bff1-4b20-9adf-3d1e5d7f1a3c/vpn.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a51a14ab-bff1-4b20-9adf-3d1e5d7f1a3c/vpn.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"vpn.PNG\",\"name\":\"vpn.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a51a14ab-bff1-4b20-9adf-3d1e5d7f1a3c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":257,\"height\":75},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To access EPAM services available only from the EPAM LAN (Local Area Network) you need to have EPAM VPN (Virtual Private Network) access.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GlobalProtect is VPN client which runs on your endpoint (desktop computer, laptop, tablet, or smart phone) to protect your devices by using the same security policies that protect the EPAM corporate network. It is also configured with 2-factor authentication and corresponds with all EPAM customer requirements for remote access areas. GlobalProtect secures your intranet traffic and allows you to connect to your corporate network to access EPAM company resources from anywhere in the world.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All EPAM employees have VPN access to EPAM network by default. The instruction on setting up EPAM VPN is available \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/index.do?ctx=docEngine&file=kmdocument&query=id%3D%22KM0107%22&action=&title=Knowledge%20Document%20KM0107\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HERE\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7832,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/61f86644-d961-4511-9a19-e951cdf96586/contact help.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/61f86644-d961-4511-9a19-e951cdf96586/contact help.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"contact help.PNG\",\"name\":\"contact help.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"61f86644-d961-4511-9a19-e951cdf96586\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":512,\"height\":81},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of any issues, please contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"Support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
